    • Uses of AccountStore in com.stormpath.sdk.account

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.account that return AccountStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountStore VerificationEmailRequest.getAccountStore()
      Returns the AccountStore set.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.account with parameters of type AccountStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VerificationEmailRequestBuilder VerificationEmailRequestBuilder.setAccountStore(AccountStore accountStore)
      Setter for the AccountStore where the specified account must be searched.

    • Uses of AccountStore in com.stormpath.sdk.accountStoreMapping

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.accountStoreMapping that return AccountStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountStore AccountStoreMapping.getAccountStore()
      Returns this mapping's AccountStore (either a Group, Organization or Directory), to be assigned to the application or organization.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.accountStoreMapping with parameters of type AccountStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountStoreMapping<T> AccountStoreMapping.setAccountStore(AccountStore accountStore)
      Sets this mapping's AccountStore (either a Group, Organization or Directory), to be assigned to the application or organization.

    • Uses of AccountStore in com.stormpath.sdk.application

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.application that return AccountStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountStore AccountStoreHolder.getDefaultAccountStore()
      Returns the AccountStore (either a Group, a Directory or an Organization) used to persist new accounts created by the Application or Organization, or null if no accountStore has been designated.
      AccountStore AccountStoreHolder.getDefaultGroupStore()
      Returns the AccountStore used to persist new groups created by the Application or Organization, or null if no accountStore has been designated.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.application with parameters of type AccountStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ApplicationAccountStoreMapping Application.addAccountStore(AccountStore accountStore)
      Creates a new ApplicationAccountStoreMapping for this Application and appends that ApplicationAccountStoreMapping to the end of the Application's ApplicationAccountStoreMapping list, allowing the associated accountStore to be used as a source of accounts that may login to the Application.
      PasswordResetToken Application.sendPasswordResetEmail(String email, AccountStore accountStore)
      Sends a password reset email to an account in the specified AccountStore matching the specified email address.
      void AccountStoreHolder.setDefaultAccountStore(AccountStore accountStore)
      Sets the AccountStore (either a Group, Organization or a Directory) used to persist new accounts created by the Application or Organization.
      void AccountStoreHolder.setDefaultGroupStore(AccountStore accountStore)
      Sets the AccountStore (a Directory) that will be used to persist new groups created by the Application or Organization.

    • Uses of AccountStore in com.stormpath.sdk.authc

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountStore UsernamePasswordRequest.getAccountStore()
      Deprecated. 
      AccountStore AuthenticationRequest.getAccountStore()
      Returns a specific AccountStore that should process this authentication request, or null if the application's default account store authentication flow should execute.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Sets a specific AccountStore that should process this authentication request, or null if the application's default account store authentication flow should execute.

      Deprecated.

    • Uses of AccountStore in com.stormpath.sdk.directory

      Subinterfaces of AccountStore in com.stormpath.sdk.directory 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Directory
      A Directory is a top-level container of Accounts and Groups.

    • Uses of AccountStore in com.stormpath.sdk.group

      Subinterfaces of AccountStore in com.stormpath.sdk.group 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Group
      A group is a uniquely-named collection of Accounts within a Directory.

    • Uses of AccountStore in com.stormpath.sdk.oauth

      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.oauth that return AccountStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountStore PasswordGrantRequest.getAccountStore()
      Returns the specific accountStore where the provided credentials will be sought in order to authenticate a request.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.oauth with parameters of type AccountStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PasswordGrantRequestBuilder PasswordGrantRequestBuilder.setAccountStore(AccountStore accountStore)
      Specifies the target Account Store to be used for the authentication token creation.

    • Uses of AccountStore in com.stormpath.sdk.organization

      Subinterfaces of AccountStore in com.stormpath.sdk.organization 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Organization
      An Organization is a top-level container of Directories and Groups.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.organization with parameters of type AccountStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OrganizationAccountStoreMapping Organization.addAccountStore(AccountStore accountStore)
      Creates a new OrganizationAccountStoreMapping for this Organization and appends that OrganizationAccountStoreMapping to the end of the Organization's OrganizationAccountStoreMapping list, allowing the association accountStore to be used as a source of accounts that may login to the Organization.
